titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the collegiate church at Manchester on Tuesday the 23. of April 1661. Being the coronation-day of his Royal Majestie Charles II. / By Richard Heyrick warden of the said colledge.
titleStmt.author: Heyrick, Richard, 1600-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Ralph Shelmerdine Bookseller in Manchester,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
